Data Analytics

Virtual and Augmented Reality

Elective 2:
Enterprise Business Systems 
Big Data
Graph Theory and it's Applications
Bio-inspired Computing

Useful electives: Adv. Algo, Data Analytics, Big Data

Scoring electives (this is subjective, and the syllabus changes every year so its not possible to predict): Data Analytics, IoT, HCI, ERP, Graph Theory
Is data analytics scoring for someone who is weak in maths

The course is basically a math course. It depends on what kind of math you do not like. There isn't any calculus, its mainly stats and probability and a bit of algebra. I would suggest going through the syllabus to figure it out.
Even applied cryptography was a pretty scoring elective last year.

Ah, it wasnt really scoring 1-2 years ago. 

As I said, scoring is pretty subjective. HCI and a bunch of other courses alternate between being easy and difficult.
